subject: shipping to india possible with all customs etc
description_text:
pertaining to the subject request details pls .

country :india
State :Tamilnadu
City:Chennai
Pincode:600085

conversations.body_text: Hi buvanesh dorairaj,    Parcels can be shipped to India, but shipping will be more expensive.

How much is shipping? and customs will be taken care by the logistics ??


On Fri, Jun 13, 2025 at 2:51 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi buvanesh dorairaj,    Sorry for not getting back to you in time, we have just finished our holiday. The shipping cost will be $39 USD and the customs clearance will be handled by the logistics company, just need you to provide the necessary information.

hi ,

which means 39 dol including the duties or it can be extra while delivering
?

and the upgraded stuff i saw on ebay USA site had some offer if id purchase
it on the site i would be eligible for the discounts ? or any promo the
team can offer pls thanks in advance for the reply


On Mon, Jun 16, 2025 at 5:01 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi buvanesh dorairaj,     We recommend making the purchase on the official website, you can add the exact amount to the cart to check, this is the price without taxes. Most likely there will be no tariffs, but if there are tariffs, you need to cooperate with the logistics provider to pay them yourself.

Hi buvanesh dorairaj,    Thank you for your recognition and purchase. But I'm sorry, the discount for free shipping over $299 is applied automatically and some countries with excessive shipping costs will not be applied. We can't apply the discount after the order has been placed, but if you encounter taxes on your customs clearance, we will cover some of them for you, is this offer ok.

ok looks a fair proposal id be very happy if you could send some gifts or
something , Order *#SSN1788 *staus also requested pls

Hi buvanesh dorairaj,     We will pay the ‘Advancement Charge’ of $9.32 charged by the courier company to pay the tax on your behalf, and cover the $20 tax for you. We will refund you $30, please confirm.

Ok I would be happy if the team considers to pay 40 dol as refund and the
balance I’ll pay

So Iam suppose to proceed with the duties payment
From my account and the refund shall happen to my credit card account from
which I made a purchase am I correct?

If so ok I’ll proceed and if the SIMSONN team Is not willing to refund 10
more dollars than what  it is stated in the trailing mail kindly proceed
let me bare the additional payment .

Expecting your support/Feedback ASAP

Buvanesh

On Thu, 26 Jun 2025 at 1:12 PM, service@simsonn.com
Hi buvanesh dorairaj,  We will refund you once you have received all your products, but we can only refund you $30, thank you for your understanding.

Ok so my question is I will pay the duties from my side and get the product
and then you will refund to my account from which I paid for the purchase
pls confirm thanks

Hi buvanesh dorairaj,    Yes, we will refund you after the order is completed.
